description:
Tree felling in the St Mary Magdalene Conservation Area
Notification has been received of the intent to carry out the following works:
X1 Sycamore - Fell
decision_conditions:
To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and to avoid a net loss of trees within the conservation area, the council expects to see a replacement tree planted in the location adjacent to the Sycamore that is to be removed.
Prior to the commencement of any works on site, full details including the size, species and location of the replacement tree to mitigate the loss of the Sycamore tree should be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The replacement tree shall be planted during the first planting season after the date of the Sycamores removal hereby approved. Suitable small species for this location would be:
Rowan (Sorbus acuparia)
Winter Flowering Cherry (Prunus subhirtella autumnalis)
Amelanchier ( Amelanchier lamarckii)
